entry.description: anatomical coordinate
entry.name: apical

entry.description: top of a plant when in flower, including the stems, leaves and blooms
entry.name: flowering top

entry.description: Seed-bearing organ on gymnosperm plants. A type of fruit, usually woody, ovoid to globular, including scales, bracts, or bracteoles arranged around a central axis, especially in conifers and cycads.
entry.name: cone
entry.synonym: Cone, Conifer cones, Strobilus, pine cone, pine-cone, pinecone, pine cones
entry.description: organe reproducteur des conifères
estructura vegetal
the female reproductive part of a flower, consisting of one or more separate or fused carpels
entry.name: pistil
entry.description: in der Botanik die miteinander zu einem coenokarpem Gynoeceum verwachsenen Fruchtblätter der Blüte mancher Bedecktsamer
organe femelle des plantes à fleur
la parte reproductiva femenina de una flor, consistente en uno o más carpelos, separados o fusionados.
fibrous material from trees or other plants
entry.name: wood
entry.description: faseriges Material von Bäumen oder anderen Pflanzen
matériau naturel
material duro y fibroso obtenido de los árboles
plant part used for flavoring, food, medicine, or perfume
entry.name: herb
entry.description: Pflanzen, deren Blätter und Blüten frisch oder getrocknet als Gewürze Verwendung finden
Les plantes aromatiques sont un ensemble de plantes utilisées en cuisine et en phytothérapie pour les arômes qu'elles dégagent
planta usada como alimento, medicina, perfume o para dar sabor
A branch that is a sclerified, pointed outgrowth. Modified stems, leaves, stipules, or parts of leaves, with sharp, rigid ends (like prickles), that commonly contain vascular tissue (unlike prickles)
entry.name: spine
entry.description: stechendes Gebilde an einer Pflanze, das an der Stelle eines Organs sitzt
terme générique du langage courant désignant épine foliaire, rameau-épine, aiguillon
young stem or branch
entry.name: shoot
entry.description: 植物新生的部分
aus Sprossachse und Blättern bestehenden, meist oberirdisch wachsenden, Teil des Kormus
nouvelle croissance d'une plante
main organ of photosynthesis and transpiration in higher plants, usually consisting of a flat green blade attached to the stem directly or by a stalk
entry.name: leaf
entry.description: पौधे के अंग
Grundorgan der höheren Pflanzen
organe spécialisé dans la photosynthèse chez les végétaux supérieurs
parte de una planta que sirve para hacer la fotosíntesis.
embryonic plant enclosed in a protective outer covering (seed coat)
entry.name: seed
entry.description: தாவர அங்கம்
Diaspore der Samenpflanzen
structure qui contient et protège l'embryon végétal
planta embrionaria
organ of a higher plant that anchors the rest of the plant in the ground, absorbs water and mineral salts from the soil, and does not bear leaves or buds
entry.name: root
entry.description: eines der drei Grundorgane der Kormophyten
partie de la plante
parte de una planta
a racemose inflorescence having many small sessile flowers borne on a fleshy stem, the whole usually being surrounded by a spathe: typical of aroid plants
entry.name: spadix

entry.description: part of a tree; a shoot axis that develops from an axillary bud meristem or from equal divisions of a meristematic apical cell
entry.name: branch
entry.description: Teil der Wuchsform des Baumes
Partie grandissante d'un arbre
parte de un árbol
small, pulpy, usually edible fruit, which may or may not be a "berry" in the botanical sense
entry.name: berry
entry.description: Beerenobst
aliment

one of 2 main structural axes of a vascular plant (together with the root), that supports leaves, flowers and fruits, transports fluids between the roots and the shoots in the xylem and phloem, stores nutrients and produces new living tissue
entry.name: plant stem
entry.description: 植物的营养器官之一，大多数植物可见的主干
Verbindung bei Pflanzen von Wurzel und Blatt
partie de plantes
órgano que sostiene las hojas, flores y frutos de una planta
sexual reproductive structure found on flowering plants
entry.name: flower
entry.description: 被子植物的生殖器官
unverzweigter Kurzspross mit begrenztem Wachstum
partie d'une plante
estructura reproductiva de las plantas fanerógamas
part of a flowering plant
entry.name: fruit
entry.description: एक फूल वाले पौधे का हिस्सा
植物的生殖器官
Blüte im Zustand der Samenreife
organe végétal
órgano de una flor que contiene las semillas de una planta
fine to coarse powder containing the microgametophytes of seed plants
entry.name: pollen
entry.description: Blütenstaub, auch Mehlstaub
élément fécondant mâle de la fleur
polvillo compuesto por los granos portadores del gametófilo masculino en las plantas con semilla
The male organ of a flower, consisting (usually) of a stalk called the filament and a pollen-bearing head called the anther
entry.name: stamen
entry.description: das Pollen-erzeugende Organ in der Blüte der Bedecktsamer
any of the separate parts of the calyx of a flower (excluding the bracts), usually green
entry.name: sepal
entry.description: Blatt der äußeren Blütenhülle in der Blüte von bedecktsamigen Pflanzen
Plant structure. any of the separate parts of the corolla of a flower: often brightly coloured
entry.name: petal
entry.description: Blatt der inneren Blütenhülle in der Blüte von bedecktsamigen Pflanzen
pieza que forma parte de la corola de la flor
one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants. xylems transport water from roots to shoots and leaves, but also some nutrients
entry.name: xylem
entry.description: Teil der Leitbündel, Stofftransport Sprossaufwärts.
type de tissus des plantes vasculaires
Solid or highly viscous substance
entry.name: resin
entry.description: feste oder viskose Masse aus natürlichen oder künstlichen chemischen Substanzen
masse solide ou visqueuse de substances chimiques naturelles ou artificielles, solides ou visqueuses
sustancia viscosa de origen vegetal o sintético
a form of inflorescence of the type found on the poinsettia
entry.name: cyathium

entry.description: run botany, part of the female reproductive organ of the flower. the hollow basal region of a carpel containing one or more ovules. In some plants the carpels are united to form a single compound ovary
entry.name: ovary
entry.description: bauchiger Teil des Stempels, in dem sich die Samenanlage mit den Eizellen befindet
Partie de l'organe reproducteur femelle de la fleur
en botánica, parte del gineceo
a compound raceme, occurring esp in grasses
entry.name: panicle
entry.description: type d'inflorescence

A reproductive shoot system that is the ultimate and congested inflorescence, especially in grasses, a racemose unit consisting of one or a few closely-packed florets born along a rachilla and subtended by two glumes
entry.name: spikelet
entry.description: Blütenstand, an dem in ährenartiger Anordnung die Blüten hinter Spelzen sitzen
unbranched, indeterminate type of inflorescence bearing pedicellate flowers along its axis
entry.name: raceme

entry.description: an inflorescence in which the first flower is the terminal bud of the main stem and subsequent flowers develop as terminal buds of lateral stems
entry.name: cyme
entry.description: type d'inflorescence
tipo de inflorescencia
the outer protective layer of a fruit or vegetable which can be peeled off
entry.name: peel
entry.description: äußere Hülle von einer Frucht
enveloppe extérieure d'un fruit
capa protectora de una fruta o vegetal
plant's underground storage organ formed by the swelling of an underground stem which produces buds and stores photosynthate metabolites/nutrients, forming a seasonal perennating organ, e.g. a potato
entry.name: tuber
entry.description: fleischiges, verdicktes Speicherorgan von Pflanzen, das unter der Erde wächst
tige souterraine verticale de plantes
tallo subterráneo donde se acumulan los nutrientes de reserva para la planta
Underground stem in which various plants asexualy reproduce via budding.
entry.name: rhizome
entry.description: Rhizome sind unterirdisch oder dicht über dem Boden wachsende Sprossachsensysteme, von denen Wurzeln in den Boden und andere Pflanzenteile aufwärts wachsen
type de tige souterraine de certaines plantes

plant tissue outside the vascular cambium or the xylem; in older trees may be divided into dead outer bark and living inner bark, which consists of secondary phloem. external parenchymal tissue, located just below the epidermis of the stem
entry.name: bark
entry.description: externes parenchymales Gewebe, das sich direkt unter der Epidermis in der Primärstruktur des Stammes befindet
Partie extérieur du tronc d'un arbre
capa más externa de tallos y de raíces de plantas leñosas
part of a plant; living tissue that transports the soluble organic compounds made during photosynthesis (known as photosynthate), in particular the sugar sucrose, to parts of the plant where needed
entry.name: phloem
entry.description: सवहन
Bastzellen im Leitbuendel von Pflanzen
type de tissu végétal
floema de las plantas
short, enlarged shoot system that has as parts a short stem in which the shoot internodes do not elongate, and one or more buds enclosed by fleshy leaves or leaf bases
entry.name: bulb
entry.description: Pflanzenteil; meist unterirdisches Speicher- und Überdauerungsorgan
pousse souterraine verticale disposant de feuilles modifiées utilisées comme organe de stockage
the part of living wood where sap flows, as distinct from the heartwood, where it doesn't
entry.name: sapwood
entry.description: äußere Holzschicht eines Baumstammes
bois périphérique, conduisant la sève brute
strong central wood in a trunk or branch. the dead inner portion of the xylem (wood) of a trunk or large root
entry.name: heartwood
entry.description: partie centrale d’un tronc ou d’une branche, souvent de couleur différente du bois du pourtour (aubier) et biologiquement morte
In botany, a tissue in the stems of vascular plants. the central region of a stem, the inner part of the stele that is produced by differentiation of the ground meristem
entry.name: pith
entry.description: weiche Substanz im Kernbereich pflanzlicher Sprossachsen
in botany, a whole plant in the gametophytic phase that has a flat growth form and no distinct organs
entry.name: thallus
entry.description: vielzellige Vegetationskörper bei Pflanzen, der nicht in Sprossachse, Wurzel und Blatt unterteilt ist
conjunto de la raíz, el tallo y las hojas de las plantas metafitas
part of a plant. A pore or small hole in the surface a leaf (or other aerial organ) allowing the exchange of gases between tissues and the atmosphere.
entry.name: stomata
entry.description: Spaltöffnung eines Blattes
orifice de petite taille dans l'épiderme des organes aériens des végétaux
slim, cylindrical flower cluster with inconspicuous or no petals. an inflorescence consisting of a spike, usually hanging, of much reduced flowers of either sex: occurs in birch, hazel, etc
entry.name: catkin
entry.synonym: ament, amentaceous plants, amentiferae, amentiferous plants, catkin-bearing plants
entry.description: Form des Blütenstands
insect-induced growth on plant. often very distinctive and even species-specific structures developed when insects, fungi or bacteria stimulate abnormal growth of a plant
entry.name: gall
entry.description: Anomalien (kugelförmige Geschwülste) im Pflanzenwachstum, die durch fremde Organismen verursacht werden
protubérance végétale causée le plus souvent par des insectes
In botany, one of a pair of crescent-shaped cells that surround a pore (stoma) in the epidermis. Changes in the turgidity of the cells cause the opening and closing of the stoma.
entry.name: guard cell

entry.description: a mass of cohering pollen grains, produced by plants such as orchids and transported as a whole during pollination
entry.name: pollinium
entry.description: Globule de pollen
botanical term. Paired, modified leaves at the base of the petiole, may be membranous or leaf-like
entry.name: stipule
entry.description: blattähnliche Auswüchse des Blattgrundes
plant structure. a small body in seed-bearing plants that consists of the integument(s), nucellus, and embryosac (containing the egg cell) and develops into the seed after fertilization
entry.name: ovule
entry.description: Organ der Samenpflanzen, das einem von einer Hülle eingeschlossenen Megasporangium entspricht
organe des plantes qui contient le gamète femelle
The seam or face at which two carpels adhere. Any of various joints between parts, as between the carpels, leaf lobes, etc, of a plant.
entry.name: commissure
entry.description: Verbindung zwischen Strukturen beider Köperseiten
Irritation des commissures bucales
A cardinal organ part of lower plants that is the region at the distal end of either a peduncle or a pedicel where the floral appendages (e.g.: sepals, petals, stamens and pistils) are attached
entry.name: receptacle
entry.description: Abschnitt der Sprossachse, der die Organe der Blüte trägt
The collective term for the sepals and petals, or either of them if one is absent. the outer part of a flower, consisting of the calyx and corolla
entry.name: perianth
entry.description: Gesamtheit der sterilen Blattorgane in der Blüte von Bedecktsamigen Pflanzen
parte no reproductiva de la flor
complete set of stamens in a flower
entry.name: androecium
entry.description: Gesamtheit der männlichen Sexualorgane in einer Blüte
estructura reproductora masculina que consta del conjunto de los estambres de una flor
A sheath-like plant organ that surrounds the plumule of a plant embryo or the emerging shoot apex of a seedling. Protects the emerging shoot system as it grows through the soil.
entry.name: coleoptile
entry.description: Schutzorgan für das aufgehende erste Blatt bei den Monokotyledonen

A type of inflorescence, with a monopodial growth habit, which at anthesis is composed of pedicellate flowers on a first order inflorescence axis with compressed inflorescence axis internodes. Appear as clusters originating from a single point.
entry.name: umbel
entry.description: type d'inflorescence
tipo de inflorescencia
the large single root of plants such as the dandelion, which grows vertically downwards and bears smaller lateral roots
entry.name: taproot

entry.description: In botany, an awn is either a hair- or bristle-like appendage on a larger structure, or in the case of the Asteraceae, a stiff needle-like element of the pappus. In grasses awns typically extend from the lemmas of the florets.
entry.name: awn
entry.description: Starrer Fortsatz eines Pflanzenorgans
prolongement en pointe de certains organes de plantes
A membranous or fleshy appendage formed by expansion of the funicle which partly or wholly covers a seed, e.g. the fleshy outer layer of lychee fruit, or that found in members of the Sapindaceae.
entry.name: aril
entry.description: fleischige Hülle, die einen Samen ganz oder teilweise umhüllt
enveloppe charnue développée autour d'une graine
any of various glandular structures secreting nectar that occur in the flowers, leaves, stipules, etc, of a plant
entry.name: nectary
entry.description: Drüsengewebe innerhalb oder außerhalb der Blüte, das den Nektar abscheidet
modified or specialized leaf, especially one associated with a reproductive structure such as a flower, inflorescence axis or cone scale
entry.name: bract
entry.description: Blatt, das in seiner Blattachsel einen Seitenspross trägt
pièce florale

In botany, a term for a part of the perianth used when the sepals and petals cannot be distinguished because of similarity in size and shape. Any of the subdivisions of a perianth that is not clearly differentiated into calyx and corolla
entry.name: tepal
entry.description: Blatt einer nicht in Kelch und Krone gegliederten Blütenhülle
A collective phyllome structure composed of two or more phyllomes immediately outside the calyx
entry.name: epicalyx
entry.description: zusätzliche kelchähnliche Hülle, die außerhalb des eigentlichen Kelches direkt unterhalb der eigentlichen Blüte liegt

water-secreting pore or gland, a small glandular structure supplied by tracheids with water-secreting epithem, often associated with a stomata which may be somewhat different in size and/or morphology from the other stomata on the plant
entry.name: hydathode
entry.description: Organ, das Wasser in flüssiger Form abgeben kann
outermost single layer of cells in plants. the outer protective layer of cells of a plant, which may be thickened by a cuticle
entry.name: epidermis
entry.description: primäres Abschlussgewebe von Sprossachse und Blättern bei höheren Pflanzen
surface des plantes
wall of a fruit, developed from the ovary/carpel wall
entry.name: pericarp
entry.description: die aus der Wand des Fruchtknotens hervorgehende Wand einer Frucht
A membranous or hairy appendage on the adaxial/upper surface of a leaf, at the junction between sheath and blade, especially in grasses
entry.name: ligule
entry.description: Anhängsel an der Übergangsstelle von Scheide und Spreitenoberseite
A cup- or tube-shaped cardinal organ part, bearing perianth and stamens on its rim, so these arise above the base, and often above the top, of the ovary
entry.name: hypanthium
entry.description: becherförmige oder röhrenförmige Struktur am Grunde der Blüte
thickening at the base of a plant leaf
entry.name: pulvinus
entry.description: verdickte Stellen in den Stielen oder an der Basis der Fiedern von Pflanzenblättern, die als Gelenke fungieren
remains of pressing fruit
entry.name: pomace
entry.description: vorwiegend feste Rückstände nach dem Auspressen des Saftes von Pflanzenbestandteilen
résidu de pressurage du fruit
a longitudinal strand of vascular tissue in the stems and leaves of higher plants
entry.name: vascular bundle
entry.description: pflanzliche Struktur zum Transport von Wasser, gelösten Stoffen und organischen Substanzen

The basic female reproductive organ in angiosperms, either consisting of a single sporophyll or a single locule of a compound ovary, with a style and a stigma. The gynoecium is the collective term for all of the carpels of a single flower.
entry.name: carpel
entry.description: 雌蕊的基本单位
Blütenorgan das die Samenanlagen trägt
part of the female reproductive organ of plants. the part of the ovary of flowering plants to which the ovules are attached
entry.name: placenta

entry.description: fine outgrowths or appendages on plants, algae, lichens, and certain protists. A unicellular or multicellular plant structure that forms a non-sclerified outgrowth from the epidermis
entry.name: trichomes
entry.description: haarähnliche Strukturen auf den Oberflächen von Pflanzen, die in Größe, Form und Dichte variieren und unterschiedliche Funktionen ausüben
poil chez les végétaux

In botany, a loosely-packed mass of often more or less rounded cork cells occurring especially in the young stem, bark or even leaf of a plant, visible on the surface as a raised, often powdery-appearing spot, through which gaseous exchange occurs
entry.name: lenticel
entry.description: Atemöffnung von Pflanzen, meist in den Blättern
Protuberancia del tronco y ramas de los árboles.
needle-like leaf of some conifers
entry.name: needle
entry.description: feuille longue et fine de conifère
in a grass floret, one of a pair (or three?) of tiny green or white scales or flaps of tissue between the lemma and palea and the stamens, possibly representing reduced inner perianth members
entry.name: lodicule
entry.description: pièce florale des Poaceae
A cluster of leaves arising from a common point resembling the arrangement of petals in a rose, ranging in form from a hemispherical tuft to a flat whorl
entry.name: rosette
entry.description: dekorative Rundelemente in stilisierter Blütenform
ornement symétrique circulaire en forme de grande rose
The first stem internode above the cotyledonary node of a plant embryo or a seedling
entry.name: epicotyl

entry.description: part of a plant. any of the hollow hairlike outgrowths of the outer cells of a root, just behind the tip, that absorb water and salts from the soil
entry.name: root hair

entry.description: One of a pair of inflorescence bracts that is part of a spikelet and subtends the two florets. Found in Poaceae and Cyperaceae. Glumes subtend the pair of florets while a lemma or palea subtend the individual florets.
entry.name: glume
entry.description: bractée située à la base de l'épillet

capillary tube formed from a series of dead lignified cells in the xylem, or single such cell, water conducting and relatively broad, where at least the primary cell wall remains intact, and the walls are lignified, being variously banded or pitted
entry.name: tracheid

entry.description: part of a flower. The pollen-receptive surface of a carpel or group of fused carpels, usually sticky; usually a point or small head at the summit of the style where deposited pollen germinates
entry.name: stigma
entry.description: oberer Abschnitt des Stempels des Fruchtblattes einer Blüte
partie d'une fleur
the part of a plant that bears the reproductive organs
entry.name: gametophore
entry.description: Träger der Geschlechtsorgane der Archegonien und der Antheridien
terme
Plant part. An elongated part of a carpel or a group of fused carpels between the ovary and the stigma.
entry.name: style
entry.description: Teil eines Stempels einer Blüte der die Narbe trägt
partie allongée du gynécée d’une fleur
structure connecting flowers or fruit to the main stem of a plant
entry.name: pedicel
entry.description: tige portant les fleurs individuelles d'une inflorescence
the petals of a flower collectively, forming an inner floral envelope
entry.name: corona
entry.description: Gesamtheit der Kron- oder Blütenblätter (Petalen) in einer Blüte mit doppelter Blütenhülle
constituant d'un végétal
verticilo interno de las flores que tienen perianto heteroclamídeo
botanical term for a slender, tubular appendage extending backward from the base of a sepal or petal
entry.name: spur
entry.description: Teil einer Blütenpflanze
the central part of a plant ovule containing the embryo sac
entry.name: nucellus
entry.description: Gewebe in der Samenanlage der Samenpflanzen, das die Megasporen ausbildet
an inflorescence in the form of a flat-topped flower cluster with the oldest flowers at the periphery. This type of raceme occurs in the candytuft
entry.name: corymb
entry.description: Form des Blütenstands
the stalk of a plant bearing an inflorescence or solitary flower
entry.name: peduncle
entry.description: bei Blütenpflanzen derjenige Abschnitt einer Sprossachse, der unterhalb des Blütenstandes liegt und diesen trägt
tige florale
in botany, the stalk of the stamen
entry.name: filament

entry.description: A gemma (plural gemmae) is a single cell, or a mass of cells, or a modified bud of tissue, that detaches from the parent and develops into a new individual. This type of asexual reproduction is referred to as fragmentation.
entry.name: gemma

entry.description: part of a flower. A collective phyllome structure that is composed of one or more sepals, and comprises the outer whorl (floral envelope) of non-reproductive floral organs that protects the developing flower bud
entry.name: calyx
entry.description: Gesamtheit der Kelchblätter (Sepalen) in einer Blüte mit doppelter Blütenhülle
ensemble des sépales
verticilo externo en las flores
flat part of a leaf
entry.name: leaf blade
entry.description: der flächige Teil eines Blattes
parte de una hoja
In botany, the lower, usually larger, of two bracts enclosing a floret (the other is the palea), in a grass spikelet
entry.name: lemma

entry.description: Radicle forms the future root
entry.name: radicle
entry.description: erste, noch unverzweigte Anlage der Wurzel am Embryo
structure in seed plants that gives rise to and contains the female reproductive cells
entry.name: micropyle
entry.description: ouverture dans le tégument de l'ovule des plantes à graine
botany term. A protective case, covering, or structure, such as a plant bud, in which an organism remains dormant for the winter.
entry.name: hibernaculum

entry.description: the inner of two bracts surrounding each floret in a grass spikelet
entry.name: palea

entry.description: a shoot or branch growing from the main stem of a plant
entry.name: offshoot

entry.description: the stalk of a leaf
entry.name: petiole
entry.description: Élément d'une feuille
A small, deciduous bulb or tuber formed in the axil of a leaf or pinna; a means of vegetative propagation
entry.name: bulbil

entry.description: small thin terminal branch of a woody plant
entry.name: twig
entry.description: Verzweigung eines Stängels bzw. Asts einer Pflanze
a cymose inflorescence in which each branch bearing a flower gives rise to two other flowering branches, as in the stitchwort
entry.name: dichasium

entry.description: Plant cell, usually two in number, in the micropylar end of the embryo sac of angiosperms associated with the egg in the egg apparatus
entry.name: synergid

entry.description: an elongation of the receptacle of a flower between the calyx and corolla
entry.name: anthophore
entry.description: புல்லி வட்டத்திற்கும் அல்லி வட்டத்திற்கும் இடையே பூத்தளம் நீட்சியடைதல்
the main (aerial) stem of a plant
entry.name: caulis

entry.description: a cymose inflorescence in which each branch gives rise to one other branch only, as in the forget-me-not and buttercup
entry.name: monochasium

entry.description: collective name for leaves of a tree or plant
entry.name: foliage
entry.description: Gesamtheit der Blattorgane von Laubbäumen und Sträuchern.
A plant organ that is part of a flower
entry.name: floral organ

entry.description: A steath-like plant organ that surrounds the radicle of a plant embryo or the emerging root of a seedling.
entry.name: coleorhiza
entry.description: scheidenförmiges Hüllorgan bei den Embryonen der Süßgräser, das die Wurzelanlage des Embryos haubenförmig umgibt
A flower development stage that begins when pollen is released by anther dehiscence and/or the stigma is receptive and ends with the process of pollination and/or floral organ senescence
entry.name: flowering
entry.description: processus biologique de développement des fleurs.
individual true flower within an inflorescence. A small flower, esp one of many making up the head of a composite flower.
entry.name: floret

entry.description: The secondary axis of a branched inflorescence
entry.name: rachilla

entry.description: The sac-like or scale-like structure that encloses the ovary in Carex
entry.name: perigynium
